column8: http://www.malaysiakini.com/news/383214DAP's Raub MP suffers stroke, recovering23 May 2017DAP's Raub MP Ariff Sabri Abdul Aziz is recovering in a hospital after suffering from a stroke on Friday.DAP stalwart Lim Kit Siang said he had been out of intensive care since Saturday and is recovering."He is doing ok, he is recovering," Lim told Malaysiakini when contacted...For the rest of this story and more, subscribe for only RM150 a year (full news access)or RM420 a year (full news + full archive access).
